info.title: .NET 7 WebAPI - Clean Architecture
info.description: Clean Architecture Template for .NET 7 WebApi built with Multitenancy Support.

get.summary: Get a list of all tenants.
Initiates the YouCan OAuth authorization flow.
Handles the OAuth callback from YouCan after user authorization.

post.summary: Disconnects a YouCan store by removing credentials and webhook subscriptions.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: The ID of the store to disconnect.

post.summary:
Receives webhooks from YouCan for order.created events.
This is the endpoint registered with YouCan during OAuth flow.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: The Store ID that was registered with YouCan.

get.summary: Gets the connection status for a YouCan store.

parameters.name: storeId
parameters.description: The ID of the store to check.

get.summary:
Lists all YouCan webhook subscriptions for a store directly from YouCan API.
Use this to see what webhooks are registered and clean up old ones.

200.description: List of webhook subscriptions from YouCan.

delete.summary:
Deletes a specific webhook subscription from YouCan.
Use this to clean up old/orphaned webhook subscriptions.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The YouCan subscription ID to delete.

post.summary:
Deletes ALL webhook subscriptions for a store from YouCan and re-subscribes with correct URL.
Use this to fix webhook URL issues after migrations.

get.summary: Get a list of all roles.
Get role details with its permissions.
Get all available permissions in the system.

post.summary: Request an access token using credentials.

parameters.name: tenant
parameters.description: Input your tenant Id to access this API

post.summary: Request an access token using a refresh token.

parameters.name: tenant
parameters.description: Input your tenant Id to access this API

parameters.name: tenant
parameters.description: Input your tenant Id to access this API

get.summary: Confirm email address for a user.
Confirm phone number for a user.

post.summary: Request a password reset email for a user.

parameters.name: tenant
parameters.description: Input your tenant Id to access this API

get.summary: Get profile details of currently logged in user.

put.summary: Update profile details of currently logged in user.
Change password of currently logged in user.

get.summary: Get permissions of currently logged in user.
Get audit logs of currently logged in user.

post.summary: Generate a number of random brands.

delete.summary: Delete the brands generated with the generate-random call.

post.summary: Search delivery companies using available filters.

get.summary: Get delivery company details by ID.

put.summary: Update API credentials for a delivery company.
Update payment terms for a delivery company.

post.summary: Search delivery notes using available filters.

get.summary: Get delivery note details by ID.

parameters.name: deliveryCompanyId
parameters.description: The ID of the delivery company sending the webhook

post.summary: Search expense types using available filters.

get.summary: Get expense type details by ID.

post.summary: Search extra tags using available filters.

get.summary: Get extra tag details by ID.
Get invoice with full details including orders.

post.summary: Search legal invoices using available filters.

get.summary: Get legal invoice details by ID.

post.summary: Search media buyer expenses using available filters.

get.summary: Get media buyer expense details by ID.

put.summary: Update an existing media buyer expense record.

delete.summary: Delete a media buyer expense record.

post.summary: Create a new media buyer expense record.
Search media buyer invoices using available filters.

get.summary: Get media buyer invoice details by ID.

put.summary: Update an existing media buyer invoice.

post.summary: Create a new media buyer invoice.
Assign an order to a worker.
Bulk assign orders to a worker with multi-service chain.
Bulk reassign orders to a different worker.

get.summary: Get active assignments for supervisor view.

post.summary: Self-assign an order (worker assigns to themselves).

get.summary: Get all scheduled callbacks for supervisor.
Get batch statistics for all workers.

post.summary: Search order costs using available filters.
Search order fees using available filters.

get.summary: Get order history by order ID.
Get order history by user ID.
get.description: Returns all actions performed by a specific user.

post.summary: Get multiple orders by their codes.

delete.summary: Remove an item from an order.

post.summary: Add a new item to an order.
Cancel an order with a reason.
Get orders assigned to current worker.
Get newly created orders awaiting processing.

get.summary: Get confirmation orders with assignment status.
Get quality orders with assignment status.
Get suivi orders with assignment status.

post.summary: Get orders pending delivery company assignment.
Assign delivery company to an order.
Bulk assign delivery company to orders.
Remove payment allocation from an order.
Get orders that need payment allocation.
Search platform integrations using available filters.

get.summary: Get platform integration details by ID.

put.summary: Update webhook URL for platform integration.

post.summary: Search product variants using available filters.

get.summary: Get all variants for a product.

post.description: Creates multiple variants for a product in a single request. Skips variants with duplicate SKUs.

post.summary: Receive a purchase and update stock with Weighted Average costing.
Mark a confirmed purchase as shipped.
Search quality checklist items using available filters.

get.summary: Get quality checklist item details by ID.

put.summary: Update an existing quality checklist item.

get.summary: Get all active quality checklist items for workers during order confirmation.

post.summary: Create a new quality checklist item.
Search shipping fees using available filters.

get.summary: Get shipping fee details by ID.

post.summary: Search SKU mappings using available filters.

get.summary: Lookup internal product by external platform SKU.

post.summary: Create multiple SKU mappings at once.
Search SMS templates using available filters.

get.summary: Get SMS template details by ID.

post.summary: Search spent ads using available filters.

get.summary: Get spent ad details by ID.

put.summary: Update an existing spent ad record.

post.summary: Create a new spent ad record.
Manually adjust stock (damage, correction, return, etc.).
Search stock transactions using available filters.

get.summary: Get stock transaction details by ID.

post.summary: Search sub-delivery companies using available filters.

post.summary: Receive webhook from external platform (YouCan, Shopify, WooCommerce, etc.)

200.description: Success response with order ID if created

isEnabled.description: Is auto-assignment enabled for this tenant?

autoAssignConfirmation.description: Auto-assign confirmation work when new orders arrive?

autoAssignSuivi.description: Auto-assign suivi work after order is confirmed?

onlyOnlineWorkers.description: Only assign to workers who are currently online?

assignmentTimeoutMinutes.description: Assignment timeout in minutes (0 = no timeout).

globalMaxOrdersPerWorker.description: Global maximum orders per worker (0 = use worker's setting).

enableQualityCheck.description: Enable quality check step before suivi?

qualityPassThreshold.description: Minimum quality score (0-100) required to pass quality check.

returnRejectedToSameConfirmateur.description: When quality check rejects an order, return to same confirmateur?

maxCallbackAttempts.description: Maximum callback attempts before marking order as unreachable.

callbackReminderMinutes.description: Minutes before scheduled callback to show reminder to worker.

autoAssignSuiviAfterConfirm.description: Auto-assign suivi to worker immediately after confirmation?

suiviToSameWorker.description: Assign suivi to the same worker who confirmed the order?

allowWorkerSelfAssign.description: Allow workers to self-assign orders from "Nouvelles" queue?

UpdateAutoAssignmentSettingsRequest.description: Update auto-assignment settings for current tenant.

keyword.description: Keyword to Search in All the available columns of the Resource.

advancedFilter.description: Advanced column filtering with logical operators and query operators is supported.

CustomerDto.description: Customer data transfer object for list and basic views.

OrderAssignmentSummaryDto.description: Simplified DTO for embedding in Order details.

DeliveryCompanyType.description:
Types of delivery companies supported by the system.
Each type has different API integration capabilities.

UpdateCredentialsRequest.description: Update API credentials for a delivery company.

UpdatePaymentTermsRequest.description: Update payment terms for a delivery company (for COD reconciliation).

CreateDeliveryNoteWithOrdersRequest.description: Create a delivery note and assign multiple orders to it.

AddOrdersToDeliveryNoteRequest.description: Add orders to an existing delivery note.

RemoveOrdersFromDeliveryNoteRequest.description: Remove orders from a delivery note.

ProcessDeliveryWebhookResponse.description: Response from processing delivery company webhook.

success.description: Whether the webhook was processed successfully.

orderId.description: Order ID that was updated (if any).

isDuplicate.description: Whether this webhook was a duplicate (already processed).

InvoiceDetailsDto.description: Invoice with full details including orders

InvoiceOrderDto.description: Simplified order info for invoice details

GenerateInvoiceFromOrdersRequest.description: CRITICAL BUSINESS LOGIC: Generate Invoice from multiple delivered orders

AssignOrderRequest.description:
Supervisor assigns an order to a worker.
Creates OrderAssignment with status "pending".
If ServiceType is "confirmation" and Order.Phase is "new", updates Phase to "confirmation".

allowReassignment.description:
If true, will reassign existing active assignment for same service to this worker.
Old assignment marked as "reassigned", new one created.

BulkAssignOrdersRequest.description:
Bulk assign orders to a worker with optional multi-service chain.
Creates OrderAssignment for each order with status "pending".

serviceTypes.description:
Service types to assign. Can be single or multiple (chain).
Examples: ["confirmation"] or ["confirmation", "suivi", "quality"]
First service starts immediately, others are auto-created on completion.

allowReassignment.description:
If true, will reassign existing active assignments for selected services.
Old assignments marked as "reassigned", new ones created.

BulkReassignOrdersRequest.description:
Bulk reassign orders to a different worker.
Marks existing active assignments as "reassigned" and creates new ones for the new worker.
If no active assignment exists for a service type, creates a new assignment (assign mode).

serviceTypes.description:
Which services to reassign. If empty or null, reassign all pending/taken services.
For orders without existing assignments, this list specifies which services to create.

SupervisorAssignmentDto.description: DTO for supervisor assignment view - combines Order info with Assignment info.

SelfAssignOrderRequest.description:
Worker self-assigns an unassigned order.
Creates OrderAssignment with status "pending" and assigns to the current user.
Requires "SelfAssign" permission on OrderAssignments.

nextAssignmentId.description: Next assignment ID if auto-chain created one.

nextServiceType.description: Next service type in the chain (if any).

CompleteAssignmentRequest.description:
Worker completes an assignment.
Changes assignment status from "taken" to "completed".

notes.description:
Optional notes from the worker about this assignment.
Stored in OrderAssignment.Notes for future reference.

ReleaseAssignmentRequest.description:
Worker releases an assignment back to the queue.
Changes assignment status to "released".
Order can then be reassigned to another worker.

WorkerAssignmentDto.description: DTO for worker's pending assignments list (includes order summary).

WorkersStatsResponse.description: Response containing stats for all workers.

WorkerStatsSummary.description: Stats summary for a single worker.

CompleteSuiviAssignmentRequest.description:
Worker completes a suivi (follow-up/tracking) assignment.
Updates order tracking state, order state (triggers auto-SMS), creates audit history,
and completes the assignment.

trackingStateId.description: New tracking state ID for the order.

notes.description: Optional notes about the suivi result.

postponedUntil.description:
Callback date when Result = "postponed".
The order will be scheduled for callback at this time.

BulkCompleteSuiviAssignmentsRequest.description:
Bulk complete multiple suivi assignments with the same result.
Used when a worker wants to mark multiple orders as delivered/returned at once.
COD amount is auto-calculated from each order's TotalPrice.

assignmentIds.description: List of assignment IDs to complete.

trackingStateId.description: New tracking state ID for all orders.

result.description:
Result of the suivi: "delivered" or "returned".
For bulk operations, only final results are allowed.

notes.description: Optional notes for all completed assignments.

nextAssignmentId.description: Next assignment ID (suivi if approved, confirmation if rejected).

CompleteQualityAssignmentRequest.description:
Worker completes a quality check assignment.
If approved, chains to suivi. If rejected, returns to confirmateur.

approved.description: Is the order approved by quality check?

notes.description: Optional notes about the quality check.

rejectionReason.description: Reason for rejection (required if not approved).

ScheduleCallbackRequest.description:
Worker schedules a callback for later.
Used when customer requests to be called back at a specific time.

notes.description: Optional notes about why callback was scheduled.

GetOrdersByCodesRequest.description: Get multiple orders by their codes.

ConfirmOrderRequest.description:
Confirm order (customer accepts the order).
Note: SMS notification will be sent automatically via OrderStateChangedEvent.
Note: Delivery company assignment is now separate (done by Suivi agents via AssignDeliveryCompanyRequest).

qualityChecks.description:
Quality checks completed during confirmation (key -> passed).
Only used when EnableQualityCheck is enabled in AutoAssignmentSettings.

CancelOrderWithReasonRequest.description:
Cancel order with reason (customer rejects the order).
IMPORTANT: Automatically restores stock for all items if order was confirmed.
Note: SMS notification will be sent automatically via OrderStateChangedEvent.

MarkOrdersAsDeliveredRequest.description:
Mark multiple orders as delivered (bulk operation).
Auto-SMS will be sent via OrderStateChangedEvent.
Also completes any active assignments (suivi, quality, etc.)

MarkOrdersAsReturnedRequest.description:
Mark multiple orders as returned (bulk operation with reason).
IMPORTANT: Automatically restores stock for all items when marking as returned.
Auto-SMS will be sent via OrderStateChangedEvent.

BulkUpdateOrderStateRequest.description: Bulk update state for multiple orders.

GrabOrderRequest.description:
Worker grabs/takes ownership of an order.
Creates an OrderAssignment and immediately takes it.

ReleaseOrderRequest.description:
Worker releases an order (unassign).
Releases the active OrderAssignment and resets order phase to "new".

BulkGrabOrdersRequest.description:
Worker grabs multiple orders at once.
Creates OrderAssignments for each order.

allOf.description: Get all orders assigned to a specific worker.
Get orders available for workers to grab (unassigned orders in confirmation phase).

ReassignOrdersRequest.description:
Reassign orders from one worker to another.
Marks old assignments as "reassigned" and creates new assignments for the new worker.

GetNewOrdersRequest.description:
Get newly created orders (Phase = "new") that have NO active assignments.
These orders need to be assigned to workers for confirmation.

ConfirmationOrderDto.description:
Unified DTO for confirmation orders view.
Combines Order info with Assignment info for supervisor dashboard.

ReadyForDeliveryOrderDto.description: DTO for orders ready for delivery with worker assignment info.

GetOrdersReadyForDeliveryRequest.description:
Get orders ready for delivery (in shipping phase, not yet in a delivery note).
Returns enriched DTO with worker assignment information.

allOf.description:
Get orders pending delivery company assignment.
These are orders in "shipping" phase with state "confirmed" but no delivery company assigned.
Used by Suivi agents to see which orders need delivery company assignment.

AssignDeliveryCompanyRequest.description:
Assign delivery company to an order (typically done by Suivi agents after confirmation).
This follows industry standard COD workflow: Confirmation Agent only verifies customer,
Suivi Agent assigns delivery company.

BulkAssignDeliveryCompanyRequest.description:
Bulk assign delivery company to multiple orders.
Used by Suivi agents to assign delivery company to all selected orders at once.

BulkMoveToShippingRequest.description: Bulk move orders from confirmation phase to shipping phase.

ArchiveOrdersRequest.description:
Archive multiple orders (bulk operation).
Archived orders won't appear in main lists unless explicitly filtered.

UnarchiveOrdersRequest.description:
Unarchive multiple orders (bulk operation).
Unarchived orders will appear back in main lists.

PaymentSummaryDto.description: Summary DTO for payment list view.

allOf.description: Request to search and filter delivery company payments.

paymentMethod.description: Filter by payment method (Cash, Bank Transfer, Check, etc.).

isFullyAllocated.description: Filter by allocation status: true = fully allocated, false = has unallocated amount, null = all.

allOf.description:
Detailed payment DTO including all order allocations.
Used when viewing a payment's full details.

PaymentOrderLinkDto.description:
DTO for payment-order link.
Shows how much of a payment was allocated to a specific order.

DeliveryCompanyPaymentDto.description:
DTO for delivery company payment.
Represents a payment received from a delivery company (e.g., 4000 DH).

CreatePaymentRequest.description:
Request to record a payment received from a delivery company.
This represents the bulk payment (e.g., 4000 DH) before allocation to specific orders.

paymentCode.description:
Payment code (optional). If not provided, will be auto-generated.
Format: {PREFIX}-{YYYYMMDD}-{SEQUENCE} (e.g., PAY-20251127-0001)

UpdatePaymentRequest.description:
Request to update a payment received from a delivery company.
Note: Amount changes will affect unallocated amount calculations.

AllocatePaymentRequest.description:
Request to allocate a portion of a delivery company payment to a specific order.
Example: From 4000 DH payment, allocate 150 DH to Order #ABC123.

DeallocatePaymentRequest.description:
Request to remove a payment allocation from an order.
This will increase the payment's unallocated amount and reset the order's COD status.

UnallocatedOrderDto.description: DTO for unallocated order (order awaiting payment allocation).

allOf.description:
Request to get orders that have been delivered but not yet allocated to a payment.
Used when allocating a delivery company payment to specific orders.

deliveryCompanyId.description: Delivery company to filter orders by (required).

deliveryDateFrom.description: Optional: Filter by delivery date from.

deliveryDateTo.description: Optional: Filter by delivery date to.

codPaymentStatus.description: Optional: Filter by specific COD payment status (Pending, Collected, etc.).

allOf.description:
Request to get outstanding COD report.
Shows orders that have been validated/delivered but not yet allocated to a payment.
This represents money owed by delivery companies.

Request to get unallocated payments report.
Shows payments that have been received but not fully allocated to orders.
Helps identify payments that need to be reconciled.

GetCompanyBalanceSummaryRequest.description:
Request to get company balance summary.
Shows aggregated financial summary for each delivery company:
- Total outstanding COD (delivered but unpaid)
- Total payments received
- Total unallocated payments
- Expected payment date based on oldest outstanding order

deliveryCompanyId.description:
Filter by specific delivery company (optional).
If null, returns summary for all companies.

includeZeroBalance.description: Include companies with zero balance (default: false).

trackStock.description:
Whether to track stock for this product. Default is true.
If false, stock check and deduction will be skipped during order confirmation.

Whether to track stock for this product.
If false, stock check and deduction will be skipped during order confirmation.

BulkCreateVariantsResult.description: Result of bulk variant creation with counts and errors.

BulkCreateProductVariantsRequest.description:
Bulk create multiple product variants at once.
Used by the enhanced product creation modal to create all variants in a single request.

VariantItemRequest.description: Individual variant item for bulk creation.

ReceivePurchaseRequest.description: Receives a purchase and updates stock using Weighted Average costing.

StatusChangeRequest.description: DTO for status change requests (confirm, ship, cancel)

UpdateTenantSettingsRequest.description: Update tenant settings (all fields at once).

AdjustStockRequest.description: Manual stock adjustment for damage, corrections, returns, etc.

CreateWorkerConfigRequest.description: Create a new worker service config for a user.

UpdateWorkerConfigRequest.description: Update an existing worker service config.

WorkerSummaryDto.description: Simplified DTO for worker selection dropdowns.

Bearer.description: Input your Bearer token to access this API
Bearer.name: Authorization
